name: SunDevs Inc
tagline: We listen, We understand, We deliver solutions.
description:
SunDevs develops digital products for companies and startups that want to innovate their business process. This innovations will help them achieve their goals of generating more sales, lowering costs and improving users experince. 
Our company specializes in developing native mobile applications for android and IOS platforms, HTML5 web pages and full stack backends using ruby on rails and node.js technologies.
Sundevs helps customers validate their hypotheses by understanding their problems and needs even before writing the first line of code. This is achieved by using methodologies such as, Design inception, Google sprints and Design thinking. Doing this allows our team to focus their time, energy and resources in building the right products the first time. 
One of the key factors that makes SunDevs a great ally to work with is our commitment to our customers. We walk the path together, advising and guiding our clients from the beginning.
